subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Nelson, the colorful reliever whose wicked slider helped the Yankees win four World Series titles from 1996 through 2000, had three stints in Seattle, but wanted to retire as a Yankee.
snippet: Jeff Nelson, the colorful reliever whose wicked slider helped the Yankees win four World Series titles from 1996 through 2000, had three stints in Seattle, but wanted to retire as a Yankee.
